column4: Insight: MF Global puts harsh light on self-regulation
column5: WASHINGTON Two weeks after MF Global's collapse  officials from the Commodity Futures Trading Commission briefed Senate staff on the brokerage firm's final days. When asked about reports that the brokerage firm had written checks that bounced when customers tried to cash them  the regulators had an admission that surprised the room: they didn't know about the bad checks.
